articles.title: Papers Call for Ushering in Golden Age of Songun Korea
articles.content:
Papers Call for Ushering in Golden Age of Songun Korea
						
 Pyongyang, January 2 (KCNA) -- Newspapers Thursday editorially call for dynamically ushering in a golden age of Songun Korea, true to the New Year Address made by supreme leader Kim Jong Un. 
					 His New Year Address serves as an inspiring banner instilling confidence in future and revolutionary pride into the service personnel and people of the DPRK and important guidelines indicating the shortcut to bringing about a leap forward and innovations in the drive for ushering in a golden age of Songun Korea, Rodong Sinmun says, and goes on:
					
					 Kim Jong Un in his New Year Address set forth the slogan for the Workers' Party of Korea and people of the DPRK for this year and clearly indicated the tasks to be fulfilled to open up the era of prosperity in the revolution and construction. 
					
					 His New Year Address is of weighty significance in making fresh advance in the movement for national reunification, protecting the sovereignty of the country and peace and demonstrating the dignity of the nation before the whole world this year, true to the behests of the great Generalissimos Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il. 
					
					 Only when all the people successfully implement the tasks set forth in the New Year Address, can they fully demonstrate the invincibility of their ideology and cause and achieve bigger successes in building a thriving nation. 
					
					 This year's struggle is a worthwhile drive to realize earlier than scheduled the beautiful ideal and dream of the people and make an advance of victors towards the grand festival to splendidly decorate the 70th anniversary of the glorious Workers' Party of Korea. 
					
					 All the party members, service personnel and people should glorify this as a year of gigantic struggle and great changes. 
					
					 Minju Joson says that the victory in 2014 is sure to be achieved as the New Year Address, which comprehensively represents far-reaching plan of Marshal Kim Jong Un to fully demonstrate Kim Il Sung's and Kim Jong Il's Korea, serves as a banner of struggle of the service personnel and people of the DPRK.

articles.title: Victims of Fascist Law on Steady Increase in S. Korea
articles.content:
Victims of Fascist Law on Steady Increase in S. Korea 
 Pyongyang, January 2 (KCNA) -- It was disclosed by the south Korean Supreme Court on Dec. 31 that the number of  those indicted for violation of the "Security Law", a fascist law, increased in south Korea throughout 2013.
					 According to the authorities of the court, the number of people charged with violation of the law as of Dec. 23 quadrupled that in 2009.
					
					 This is all time high since 2003.
					
					 Irony is that more people who had fallen victim to the law were declared not guilty than in the past though the number of violators of the law is on the increase.
					
					 Legal circles are becoming increasingly critical that this is attributable to the puppet regime's excessive invocation of the law and abuse of its right to arraignment.

articles.title: DPRK Photo, Book and Fine Art Exhibition Opens in Russia
articles.content:
DPRK Photo, Book and Fine Art Exhibition Opens in Russia
						
 Pyongyang, January 2 (KCNA) -- A Korean photo, book and fine art exhibition was opened with due ceremony at the Far Eastern Fine Arts Museum in Khabarovsk City, Russia on December 25, 2013 on the occasion of the second anniversary of Supreme leader Kim Jong Un's assumption of supreme commandership of the Korean People's Army.
					 Seen on the front of the venue of the exhibition were portraits of smiling President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Displayed there were photos documenting their immortal exploits. Also on display there were famous works of peerlessly great persons of Mt. Paektu and photos and books introducing Songun Korea and fine art works associated with Koreans' resourcefulness and talents.
					
					 Present there were figures of the Khabarovsk Territory Administration, Legislative Assembly and the Khabarovsk City Administration and masses.
					
					 A. N. Sokolov, mayor of Khabarovsk City, said in his speech.
					
					 Russia and the DPRK have made positive efforts to boost the traditional friendly and cooperative relations.
					
					 The DPRK is not big in its territory but is very strong in its sovereignty.
					
					 The exhibition offers citizens of Khabarovsk City an opportunity to know well about the successes being made by the Korean people in building a thriving socialist nation under the leadership of Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 And they will also have a chance to see and feel the developing culture in the DPRK and the Korean people's resourcefulness and talents.
					
					 The Korean people will register fresh successes in building a thriving nation overcoming all sorts of difficulties under the leadership of Kim Jong Un.
					
					 The exhibition will last till January 15.

articles.title: Kim Jong Suk's Noble Life Praised by Russian Paper
articles.content:
Kim Jong Suk's Noble Life Praised by Russian Paper
						
 Pyongyang, January 2 (KCNA) -- The 47th issue of the Russian paper Patriot allotted two whole pages to an article titled "Kim Jong Suk's whole life always shines as an epic on deep love" illustrated with a photo of President Kim Il Sung, leader Kim Jong Il and anti-Japanese war hero Kim Jong Suk and a photo of her on the occasion of her 96th birth anniversary.
					 The paper said that Kim Jong Suk's life was not long but it is deeply impressing the people as an epic on her boundless self-sacrificing spirit and profound comradeship.
					
					 It went on:
					
					 Kim Jong Suk was a soldier infinitely loyal to Kim Il Sung and the great mother of Korea.
					
					 She most courageously struggled for Kim Il Sung's personal safety.
					
					 More than one time she became herself a shield and protected Kim Il Sung at the risk of her life.
					
					 It was her greatest feat that she gave birth to Kim Jong Il and brought him up as a brilliant future leader of the DPRK.
					
					 Her august name is always shining with the DPRK.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Work Posted on Website by Ecuadorian Organization
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Work Posted on Website by Ecuadorian Organization
						
 Pyongyang, January 2 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un's talk "Let Us Add Eternal Brilliance to Comrade Kim Jong Il's Great Idea and Achievements of the Songun Revolution" was posted by the Ecuadorian Youth Group of Juche on its website on December 27, 2013. The talk was published in Rodong Sinmun, organ of the Workers' Party of Korea, and Joson Inmingun, organ of the Korean People's Army, on the occasion of the Day of Songun.
					 The talk, made public on August 25, Juche 102 (2013), deals with the Songun revolutionary feats of leader Kim Jong Il and clarifies the essence and originality of the Songun revolutionary idea and the tasks to successfully accomplish the revolutionary cause of Songun.

articles.title: Article Introducing DPRK Posted on Vietnamese Website
articles.content:
Article Introducing DPRK Posted on Vietnamese Website
						
 Pyongyang, January 2 (KCNA) -- An article introducing the DPRK was posted on a Vietnamese website on Dec. 25 last year.
					 It said that a huge construction is now under way not only in Pyongyang City and major provincial capitals but in rural areas, adding that there sprang up monumental structures in the DPRK one after another recently.
					
					 People's mental power is given fullest play in the DPRK, the article noted. The Korean people have built tremendous defence capabilities by weathering difficulties with high national self-respect and ideological awareness.
					
					 If one watches the grand gymnastic and artistic performance "Arirang", one can clearly realize what high self-respect the Korean people have, it said, adding:
					
					 The world recognizes the developed science and technology in the country.
					
					 The DPRK ranks itself among a few world powers in such fields as space technology, technology for launching satellite, nuclear technology, etc.
					
					 The article was accompanied by photos of Kim Il Sung Square, Changjon Street, Kwangbok Street, etc.

articles.title: Celebran en RPDC el primero de enero del Ano Nuevo 2014
articles.content:
Celebran en RPDC el primero de enero del Ano Nuevo 2014
						
Pyongyang, 2 de enero (ACNC) -- Tuvieron lugar en la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea las celebraciones del primero de enero del 103 (2014) de la Era Juche.
					La plaza del Palacio del Sol Kumsusan, supremo lugar del Juche donde reposan los cuerpos de los Generalisimos Kim Il Sung y Kim Jong Il, estuvo repleta de los visitantes capitalinos.
					
					Los oficiales y soldados del Ejercito Popular de Corea, los trabajadores y los jovenes y escolares rindieron homenaje postumo a los Generalisimos ante sus estatuas de bronce y retratos con amplia sonrisa, situados en la capitalina colina Mansu, las ciudades de Kanggye, Hamhung y Wonsan y otros lugares.
					
					El jolgorio de fiesta crecio en los teatros capitalinos.
					
					El Teatro Nacional de Drama, el Gran Teatro de Pyongyang Este y el Teatro Moranbong fueron escenarios de la funcion del drama revolucionario "Tres en pugna por el poder" y los espectaculos preparados por la banda Samjiyon del Conjunto Artistico Mansudae y la Orquesta Sinfonica Nacional.
					
					El Circo de Pyongyang preparo para los espectadores la acrobacia corporal, las habilidades de animales y las piezas comicas.
					
					Los artistas del Conjunto Operistico Mar de Sangre, el Conjunto Dramatico Nacional y el Instituto de Musica Yun I Sang montaron sus escenas en el Complejo Termoelectrico de Pyongyang y estimularon mucho a los obreros con buenas musicas y materiales de ayuda.
					
					Lo hicieron tambien el Conjunto Nacional de Arte Tradicional, el Conjunto Circense Nacional y el Conjunto de Titeres de Pyongyang en la Central Termoelectrica de Pyongyang Este.
					
					Las sonrisas se desbordaron en los centros de diversiones como el Club de Equitacion de Mirim, el Complejo de Piscinas de Recreacion de Munsu, el  Centro de Patinaje al Aire Libre del Pueblo, el Acuario de Delfines de Rungna, el cine de ritmo tridimensional de Rungna y el Parque de Atracciones Juventud de Kaeson.
					
					Entre tanto, el Restaurante Okryu, el Restaurante Chongryu, la Avenida de Restaurantes de Changgwang y otros complementaron el menu con platos de fiesta como el fideo con carne de faisan y las comidas hechas con tortuga de agua dulce y codorniz.
					
					Las redes de servicios gastronomicos en distintas localidades alegraron mucho a los clientes con platos especiales locales.
					
					La felicidad se asomaba tambien a las ventanas de las viviendas para los educadores de la Universidad Kim Il Sung y las del reparto para cientificos Unha, la avenida de Changjon y la ciudad de Manpho.

articles.title: Periodicos llaman a abrir el tiempo de prosperidad de la Corea del Songun
articles.content:
Periodicos llaman a abrir el tiempo de prosperidad de la Corea del Songun
						
Pyongyang, 2 de enero (ACNC) -- En sendos editoriales difundidos hoy, los periodicos capitalinos llamaron a abrir el tiempo de prosperidad de la Corea del Songun en acato al mensaje del Ano Nuevo del Mariscal Kim Jong Un.
					El diario Rodong Sinmun senala que ese mensaje es la bandera estimulante, que infunde en el ejercito y pueblo coreanos la conviccion del futuro y el orgullo revolucionario, y la orientacion programatica que aclaro el atajo a grandes saltos e innovaciones para abrir el tiempo de prosperidad de la Corea del Songun, y prosigue:
					
					En su mensaje, el Mariscal presento la consigna combativa a levantar este ano por el Partido del Trabajo de Corea y el pueblo y enumero las tareas para comenzar la era de plena prosperidad en la revolucion y la construccion.
					
					El mensaje tiene capital importancia en registrar nuevos avances en el movimiento de este ano por la reunificacion de la patria acorde al legado de los Generalisimos Kim Il Sung y Kim Jong Il, defender la soberania y la paz del pais y demostrar a todo el mundo la dignidad nacional.
					
					Cuando todo el pueblo materialice cabalmente las tareas combativas presentadas en el mensaje, podra reafirmar lo invencible de su idea y causa y lograr mayores exitos en la construccion de un Estado prospero en el ano en curso.
					
					La lucha del presente ano es la valiosa para realizar con adelanto los hermosos ideales y suenos del pueblo y significa la marcha de los triunfadores previa al gran festival por el 70o aniversario de la fundacion del glorioso PTC.
					
					Todos los militantes del partido, los oficiales y soldados del Ejercito Popular de Corea y el pueblo deben glorificar este ano como el de magna lucha y grandes cambios.
					
					El periodico Minju Joson apunta en su editorial que esta asegurada tambien la victoria del 2014 porque la lucha de los uniformados y civiles coreanos se librara segun el mensaje del Ano Nuevo en que estan sintetizados los ambiciosos proyectos del Mariscal para hacer brillar en todo el mundo a la Corea de Kim Il Sung y Kim Jong Il.
